title: Walter Johnson SGC 2 Sov Back for Trade
author: CrazyDiamond

posts.post_title: Walter Johnson SGC 2 Sov Back for Trade
posts.post_content:
Testing the waters with this one.  I am looking to trade or potentially upgrade this Johnson portrait.  SGC grade 30 (2)  

Just looking for a nice 3 PSA or SGC 

or

would like to trade.  Primarily looking for a Green Cobb or Cobb Bat off.  Low grade PSA or SGC with nice eye appeal.  I will consider other Hall of Famers (doesnt neccessarily have to be T206) but these are my first priority.  Obviously will add cash when neccessary.

Let me know what you have

Thanks
